mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user_coupon
user_id,
coupon_id,
use_status,
version,
create_time,
update_time,
is_active,
#{userId},
#{couponId},
#{useStatus},
#{version},
#{createTime},

insert.foreach:
insert into t_user_coupon
user_id,
coupon_id,
use_status,
version,

#{item.userId},

mapper.delete:
delete from t_user_coupon where id in
#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_user_coupon
user_id = #{userId},
coupon_id = #{couponId},
use_status = #{useStatus},
version = #{version},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_active = #{isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
where id = #{id} and version + 1 <= #{version}

update.foreach:
update t_user_coupon
user_id = #{item.userId},
coupon_id = #{item.couponId},
use_status = #{item.useStatus},
version = #{item.version},
create_time = #{item.createTime},
update_time = #{item.updateTime},
is_active = #{item.isActive},
update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
version = version + 1,
where id = #{item.id}

mapper.sql: id as id, user_id as userId, coupon_id as couponId, use_status as useStatus, version as version, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_active as isActive
